I don't get why this is here when in reality you can literally google it and it will come right up. 
Google: Pokemon Go APKmirror
so this is really useless when this is free

> [lisbon](#comment_1_1Bg6kMAFw1VpCzz9qiuF3HzM5fugiXaaUr): Its still convenient to have. In my opinion every file you could ever possibly need should be available via torrent. I used an APK actually to install on a friends Nexus 7 tablet. Google play wouldn't allow him to install it for some reason, so we did it manually and he just connected the tablet to a mobile hotspot. And the more torrents we have on here (even if a google search or two could find them as well) the better it is for the site in general.

The APK is fine and dandy and I applaud using it, its that there's no point in putting it in a torrent. You can also add it to almost any cloud drive it's so small.
